1174960.name: Derpy pirates! Demo
1174960.description:
The game is currently in development and is expected to be released soon.

This demo contains some of the basic game play that the full game will feature, the overall reason for releasing this demo is to get feedback and see what people think of the overall quality of the game.

I am solo developer and have been working on this game part time for almost 5 years, the game has gone through many different stages and I am now ready to show the world what I have created.

There is no storyline in the demo version. The full game features cinematic cuts, voice overs and other things.

Please send an email to mail@derpypirates.com if you have any suggestions or bugs you would like to report on the demo.
1174960.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
